name: Cyberchase (Fabrício Guedes Faria)
description:
Whoa dude!

You just robbed a bank, and the cops are trying to get you! Drive through the city avoiding cars and bikes, to the sound of synth music, and blow up some of them in the process. Why not, right?

Use the arrow keys (or swipe on mobile) to move.

This game was made during the 30 hour Geleia Jam, in June 2019, with the theme "Competitive Cooperation" (which we failed at). Check out our entry.

Team:

  • Fabrício Guedes: Programmer
  • Gabriel Simmel: Programmer
  • Leonardo Pizani: Artist
  • Rafael Clerici: Artist, Designer
